title: FS: T207 Brown Background Tris Speaker PSA 4 ( Recruit back )
author: svtPONY95

posts.post_title: FS: T207 Brown Background Tris Speaker PSA 4 ( Recruit back )
posts.post_content:
Very tough card for sale ......... T207 Tris Speaker ( Recruit back ) graded a PSA 4. PSA population report shows 36 total cards graded with 7 higher.This is a very high end PSA 4 with awesome centering and real appeal. VCP shows last sale @ $1303.50 on 05/03/12 and I am asking $1375.00.
